author: njomu
title: Former EastEnders star Craig Fairbrass, 53, shows off his muscular frame in Barbados
text:
Former EastEnders star Craig Fairbrass, 53, shows off his muscular frame in Barbados 
The actor proved he can still get pulses racing during his relaxing beach day BY NOLA OJOMU, SHOWBIZ REPORTER 5th February 2017, 9:54 am Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments FORMER EastEnders star Craig Fairbrass proved he still has his action hero frame as he showed off his bulky physique on holiday in Barbados. 
The 53-year-old actor – who famously played lothario Dan Sullivan on the BBC soap – was spotted enjoying a day on the beach with his wife Elke Kellick as they soaked up some of the Caribbean sunshine. MEGA 4 Former EastEnders heartthrob Craig Fairbrass proved he still has his action hero frame while on holiday in Barbados 
Craig showcased his deep tan and muscular physique as he strolled along the beach wearing black shorts, while his wife opted for a blue and white striped bikini. 
The former page three model shielded her head from the sun with a white baseball hat and went on to cover up with a white vest dress. 
Meanwhile Craig covered up with a deep v peach shirt and was ever the gentleman as he helped to carry his wife’s beach bag. 
Craig was sure to update his fans on social media about the blissful holiday as he shared a selfie on the beach captioned: “Massive thank you to the House and its staff in Barbados @ElegantHotels – for a very classy and relaxing stay/ Tranquility at its best.” 
The actor fondly remembered for his role as playboy Dan on EastEnders after playing the role from 1999 until 2001. BBC Craig famously played lothario Dan Sullivan on EastEnders from 1999 to 2001 MEGA 4 The 53-year-old actor was spotted enjoying a day on the beach with his wife Elke Kellick 
During his time of the soap he enjoyed in several memorable storylines, including having an affair with Bianca Jackson at the same time as being in a relationship with her mother. 
His character was also conned out of his share of The Queen Victoria pub and was wrongly imprisoned for the shooting of archenemy Phil Mitchell after being framed. MEGA 4 Craig went on to coverup with a deep v peach shirt and was ever the gentleman as he helped to carry his wife’s beach bag 
However, he first got his big break as an actor when starring opposite Hollywood star Denzel Washington in their 1980 film, For Queen and Country. 
He also starred alongside Sylvester Stallone in the 1993 flick Cliffhanger and more recently starred alongside Jason Statham in The Bank Job.
